parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of instances from which you want to unbind the SSH key pair. The value can be a JSON array that consists of up to 50 instance IDs. Separate multiple instance IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: KeyPairName
parameters.description: The name of the SSH key pair.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the SSH key pair. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
